title: Calories in a Chocolate Croissant
meta_description: Discover calories in chocolate croissant, including full nutrition breakdown per serving, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard bakery chocolate croissant (~80 g), buttery pastry with chocolate filling, baked fresh, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One chocolate croissant provides ~350 kcal, with high carbs from pastry and fat from butter.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in chocolate croissant?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for one standard chocolate croissant.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a chocolate croissant?
faqs.a: Around 40 g carbs, mostly from the flaky pastry dough.

faqs.q: Are chocolate croissants high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~18 g total fat per croissant, with 10 g saturated from butter.

faqs.q: How much protein in chocolate croissant?
faqs.a: Roughly 6 g protein, not a significant source.
